title: Three storied House close to Baseline Road, Dematagoda
details:
Architecturally designed solidly built three storied large house close to Baseline road, Dematagoda is available for sale
One minute walk to Kolonnawa road
1.2km to Baseline road, Dematagoda
Highly commercial area
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Five bed rooms with three bath rooms
Pantry area and wet kitchen is there
Large basement can be used for office or any commercial purpose
Facing to 20 ft road, but entrance is 15ft, (residents encroached the road way )
